original_title: Chhota Bheem aur Malongh ka Raaz
overview: Bheem and the children get welcome to the town of Malonngh in Northeast India to observe Bheem’s birthday. In the wake of coming to there they become friends with Bheem’s fan, Chimon. The children engage in the town customs and customs and go on an experience to a close by enchanted woods, the Forest Of Myth. Yet, soon their experience transforms into a misfortune as Bheem liberates a one-legged troll and gets reviled from the monster of the wilderness. Bheem’s birthday day gets vanishes from the schedules and on that equivalent date, the townspeople play out a custom to pacify the monster consistently as a revile is on them too.
title: Chhota Bheem aur Malongh ka Raaz
